attributes.action: Give War Veteran Captain Tom Moore an MBE for his fundraising
attributes.additional_details: To put Captain Tom Moore forward to receive an award for inspiring a whole Nation when we needed it most.
attributes.background: During this difficult time in the UK, we all looked for hope and inspiration. Then 99yr old War veteran Captain Tom Moore arrived and raised over £4 million pounds for our NHS, he deserves to be recognised for his extraordinary efforts.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
